definition.para: Notes for staff only, notes of an administrative nature.

instructions.para: Input your staff notes however you wish.

admin.para: Customarily this field is searchable in CONTENTdm while the collection is being developed; when the collection is done, the field should not be searchable.

history.justification: Staff needed a way to communicate about administering the resource inside CONTENTdm, so we created this property.

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation.
Added some cdm compound object information
